verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician [לִידִיתוּן כ] (לִֽידוּת֗וּן <WH3038> Jeduthun ק) מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David אָמַ֗רְתִּי <WH559> I said אֶֽשְׁמְרָ֣ה <WH8104> I will take heed דְרָכַי֮ <WH1870> to my ways מֵחֲט֪וֹא <WH2398> that I sin בִלְשׁ֫וֹנִ֥י <WH3956> not with my tongue אֶשְׁמְרָ֥ה <WH8104> I will keep לְפִ֥י <WH6310> my mouth מַחְס֑וֹם <WH4269> with a bridle בְּעֹ֖ד <WH5704> against רָשָׁ֣ע <WH7563> while the wicked לְנֶגְדִּֽי׃ <WH5048> my presence

נֶאֱלַ֣מְתִּי <WH481> I was dumb ד֭וּמִיָּה <WH1747> with silence הֶחֱשֵׁ֣יתִי <WH2814> I held my peace מִטּ֑וֹב <WH2896> [even] from good וּכְאֵבִ֥י <WH3511> and my sorrow נֶעְכָּֽר׃ <WH5916> was stirred

חַם־ <WH2552> was hot לִבִּ֨י ׀ <WH3820> My heart בְּקִרְבִּ֗י <WH7130> within בַּהֲגִיגִ֥י <WH1901> me while I was musing תִבְעַר־ <WH1197> burned אֵ֑שׁ <WH784> the fire דִּ֝בַּ֗רְתִּי <WH1696> spake בִּלְשֽׁוֹנִי׃ <WH3956> I with my tongue

הוֹדִ֘יעֵ֤נִי <WH3045> make me to know יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> LORD קִצִּ֗י <WH7093> mine end וּמִדַּ֣ת <WH4060> and the measure יָמַ֣י <WH3117> of my days מַה־ <WH4100> and what הִ֑יא <WH1931> me אֵ֝דְעָ֗ה <WH3045> what it [is that] I may know מֶה־ <WH4100> how חָדֵ֥ל <WH2310> how frail אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> I

הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold טְפָח֨וֹת ׀ <WH2947> [as] an handbreadth נָ֘תַ֤תָּה <WH5414> Behold thou hast made יָמַ֗י <WH3117> my days וְחֶלְדִּ֣י <WH2465> and mine age כְאַ֣יִן <WH369> nothing נֶגְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5048> your sight אַ֥ךְ <WH389> Surely כָּֽל־ <WH3605> [is] as nothing before thee verily every הֶ֥בֶל <WH1892> vanity כָּל־ <WH3605> [is] altogether אָ֝דָ֗ם <WH120> man נִצָּ֥ב <WH5324> at his best state סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

אַךְ־ <WH389> Surely בְּצֶ֤לֶם ׀ <WH6754> in a vain shew יִֽתְהַלֶּךְ־ <WH1980> walketh אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> Surely every man אַךְ־ <WH389> Surely הֶ֥בֶל <WH1892> in vain יֶהֱמָי֑וּן <WH1993> surely they are disquieted יִ֝צְבֹּ֗ר <WH6651> he heapeth up וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> and does not יֵדַ֥ע <WH3045> [riches] and knoweth מִי־ <WH4310> who אֹסְפָֽם׃ <WH622> not who shall gather
וְעַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> and now מַה־ <WH4100> what קִּוִּ֣יתִי <WH6960> what wait אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> And now Lord תּ֝וֹחַלְתִּ֗י <WH8431> I for? my hope לְךָ֣ הִֽיא׃ <WH1931> he

מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all פְּשָׁעַ֥י <WH6588> me from all my transgressions הַצִּילֵ֑נִי <WH5337> Deliver חֶרְפַּ֥ת <WH2781> me not the reproach נָ֝בָ֗ל <WH5036> of the foolish אַל־ <WH408> nay תְּשִׂימֵֽנִי׃ <WH7760> make
נֶ֭אֱלַמְתִּי <WH481> I was dumb לֹ֣א <WH3808> not אֶפְתַּח־ <WH6605> I opened פִּ֑י <WH6310> not my mouth כִּ֖י <WH3588> Because אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> who עָשִֽׂיתָ׃ <WH6213> because thou didst
הָסֵ֣ר <WH5493> away מֵעָלַ֣י <WH5921> and נִגְעֶ֑ךָ <WH5061> thy stroke מִתִּגְרַ֥ת <WH8409> by the blow יָ֝דְךָ֗ <WH3027> of thine hand אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am כָלִֽיתִי׃ <WH3615> from me I am consumed

בְּֽתוֹכָ֘ח֤וֹת <WH8433> When thou with rebukes עַל־ <WH5921> for עָוֹ֨ן ׀ <WH5771> for iniquity יִסַּ֬רְתָּ <WH3256> dost correct אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> man וַתֶּ֣מֶס <WH4529> to consume away כָּעָ֣שׁ <WH6211> like a moth חֲמוּד֑וֹ <WH2530> thou makest his beauty אַ֤ךְ <WH389> Surely הֶ֖בֶל <WH1892> [is] vanity כָּל־ <WH3605> every אָדָ֣ם <WH120> surely every man סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

שִֽׁמְעָ֥ה־ <WH8085> Hear תְפִלָּתִ֨י ׀ <WH8605> my prayer יְהוָ֡ה <WH3068> O LORD וְשַׁוְעָתִ֨י ׀ <WH7775> unto my cry הַאֲזִינָה֮ <WH238> and give ear אֶֽל־ <WH413> at דִּמְעָתִ֗י <WH1832> at my tears אַֽל־ <WH408> not תֶּ֫חֱרַ֥שׁ <WH2790> hold not thy peace כִּ֤י <WH3588> I am a גֵ֣ר <WH1616> for I [am] a stranger אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> I עִמָּ֑ךְ <WH5973> You תּ֝וֹשָׁ֗ב <WH8453> with thee [and] a sojourner כְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אֲבוֹתָֽי׃ <WH1> as all my fathers
הָשַׁ֣ע <WH8159> O spare מִמֶּ֣נִּי <WH4480> at וְאַבְלִ֑יגָה <WH1082> me that I may recover strength בְּטֶ֖רֶם <WH2962> Before אֵלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> depart וְאֵינֶֽנִּי׃ <WH369> no
